AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cub loon chaser
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] would spend hours each day chasing the local chub loons around the coast. [PAWN_nameDef] never got close to actually catching one, which is quite an accomplishment as chub loons aren't exactly fast on land.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: echatere herder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] would always tell everyone how [PAWN_pronoun] helped to herd the tame echatere. In truth, [PAWN_nameDef] was bait, [PAWN_pronoun]. Would whistle, and then [PAWN_pronoun] would run.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tiny warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was practically born with a sword in [PAWN_possessive] hands. Every day since [PAWN_pronoun] would walk [PAWN_nameDef], was out in the fields, swinging away at anything that got too close. Luckily [PAWN_nameDef] was smart, and kept [PAWN_possessive] distance from the echatere herd.
